price: Sila namni mu’umina ta’e akka nama fincilaatii? Wal hin qixxaa’an.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
